endpoints.description: Deletes a specific message from a given channel, based on its UTC timestamp.

parameters.name: datetime
parameters.description: UTC timestamp of the message to be deleted (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.sss).

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user requesting message deletion.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: Server ID where the channel is located.

parameters.name: channel_name
parameters.description: Name of the channel containing the message.
